revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - I would have done it as the first entry <:ⲡ<:ὁλοκόττινος=grc|reg|ϩⲟⲗⲟⲕⲟⲧⲧⲓⲛⲟⲥ:>|reg|ⲫⲱⲗⲟⲕⲟⲧⲥⲉ:> following the syntax ⲛ<:ⲡ<:ἅγιος=grc|reg|ϩⲁⲅⲓⲟⲥ:>|reg|ⲫⲁⲅⲓⲟⲥ:>, but true the Greek is not displayed in the apparatus. finalizer, please try Laver's proposal and verify the preview! The rest is fine to me

Vote - AcceptText - Text entry correct. Preview doesn't show the Greek regularisation in apparatus: to achieve that, we may need to change <:ⲡ<:ὁλοκόττινος=grc|reg|ϩⲟⲗⲟⲕⲟⲧⲧⲓⲛⲟⲥ:>|reg|ⲫⲱⲗⲟⲕⲟⲧⲥⲉ:> ==> <:ⲡ<:ὁλοκόττινος=grc|reg|ϩⲟⲗⲟⲕⲟⲧⲧⲓⲛⲟⲥ:>|reg|<:ὁλοκόττινος=grc|reg|ⲫⲱⲗⲟⲕⲟⲧⲥⲉ:>:>, but that would not be strictly correct. Next voter?
Submit - Entered according to the edition. Please check Greek loanword lin3. Not sure that I have got it right. Also check the word separation. I madea change from the edition in lin1.

div.ab:
